skills.title: DNA Repair Capacity - Columbia University
skills.description: I studied the DNA repair capacity of lymphoblastoid cell lines (LCLs) after they have been exposed to UV during different time intervals using Comet Assays.

skills.title: Pharmaceutical Approaches to Breast Cancer - Columbia University
skills.description: I studied how investigational drugs in combination with neoadjuvant or pre-surgery care improves pathologic response in high-risk breast cancer patients.

portfolio.title: Solar Cyberrush | C#
portfolio.description: Dystopian puzzle game. Worked with CameraSwitchers, light mechanisms, menu page, and wire puzzles.

portfolio.title: Beezy-Body | C#
portfolio.description: A platformer game consisting of health, energy, and difficulty bars. Implemented three levels with intricate user interaction.

portfolio.title: FourEvYear |  JavaScript, ReactJS, MySQL
portfolio.description: FourEvYear provides personalized four-year plans for Columbia students. Built authentication system and dataframes.
